page.title: 01FAIRLIGHT AREA, EAST SUSSEX
page.content:
This block covers the eastern end of Hastings, most of the parish of Fairlight and parts of the parishes of Guestling and Pett, East Sussex. Hastings is represented by Hastings Borough Council, and Fairlight, Guestling and Pett are represented by Rother District Council. East Sussex is the county authority for both Hastings Borough Council and Rother District Council.
Population % under % over TOTAL l98l Census l6 years 60 years POP. _____________________________________ Hastings 73,622 Fairlight 11.2 44.51 1,474 Guestling 20.6 25.3 1,365 Pett 15.68 32.12 672 ______________________________________
